import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage-extra-info', templateUrl: './homepage-extra-info.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage-extra-info.component.css'] }) export class HomepageExtraInfoComponent { }

Why book with us?

Looking to plan your next trip? Look no further than us! We are committed to providing you with the best travel experience possible, with competitive prices and excellent customer service. Book with us for a stress-free and enjoyable journey.

COVID-19 Information

We understand that COVID-19 has brought uncertainty and concerns around travel. That's why we've implemented strict safety measures to ensure your health and well-being during your journey. Rest assured that we are following all guidelines set forth by health organizations and governments to provide you with a safe and comfortable travel experience.

Refund Policy

We understand that plans can change and sometimes cancellations are unavoidable. That's why we offer a flexible refund policy to accommodate your needs. Our refund policy varies depending on the type of ticket purchased, so please check with us for more details. Our goal is to make your travel experience as hassle-free as possible.
